shadow.field:
if (!window.ar_cyber_module) return;

const url = window.ar_cyber_module.ARmodelURL_cyber;
if (!url) return;

const btn = document.createElement("a");
btn.href =
 "intent://arvr.google.com/scene-viewer/1.0?file=" +
 url +
 "#Intent;scheme=https;package=com.google.android.googlequicksearchbox;action=android.intent.action.VIEW;S.browser_fallback_url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.ar.core;end;";
btn.innerText = "Enter AR";
btn.rel = "ar";
btn.target = "_blank";

btn.click();
setTimeout(() => btn.remove(), 1500);

if (!window.ar_cyber_module) return;

window.ar_cyber_module.openAr({
 onUploaded: (url) => {
 const popup = window.ar_cyber_module.document_state.querySelector('.confirm_ar');
 if (popup) popup.style.display = 'flex';
 },
 get_glbBase64: () => PROC['get_glbBase64']
})

document.body.insertAdjacentHTML(
 'beforeend',
 `<model-viewer id="modelViewer" loading="eager" alt="test" src="${VARS["gltf"]}" ar ar-modes="scene-viewer webxr quick-look"></model-viewer>`
);

const modelViewer = document.getElementById('modelViewer');

modelViewer.addEventListener("load", () => {
 const interval = setInterval(() => {
 if (modelViewer.modelIsVisible === true) {
 clearInterval(interval);
 modelViewer.activateAR();
 }
 }, 100)
});
